rows.label: qst000602_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, what's up? Here to talk business?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0002
rows.name:
[ML:Dash ]I see. A stove repair for
Twaina-san. Leave it to me.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0003
rows.name:
In that case... that'll
be 3000G for the job.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0004
rows.name:
Sorry, but I have a policy of
getting paid before I start work.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0005
rows.name: The missus is very strict about it...

rows.label: qst000602_msg0006
rows.name:
A tongue-lashing from my wife
is far scarier than a Divine
Beast's life coming to an end...

rows.label: qst000602_msg0007
rows.name:
So, that's why I'm asking for
payment upfront. If you want the
job done, you'll have to pay first.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, depending on the terms,
I might do it for free.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0009
rows.name:
Actually, there's something I want
to give my wife as a present.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0010
rows.name:
She's always working so hard, so
it's a token of my gratitude.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0011
rows.name:
It's called a Chain of Keys, but you
don't see it in shops very often.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0012
rows.name:
I think you can get one by
salvaging, but as you can
see, I'm no salvager...

rows.label: qst000602_msg0013
rows.name:
If you bring me a Chain of Keys,
I'll take on this job for free.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0014
rows.name:
Of course, if you'd rather
pay, I'll still do the job.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0015
rows.name:
Either way is fine. Let me
know when you've decided.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0101
rows.name: So, have you decided what to do?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0102
rows.name: What will you give him?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0103
rows.name: Give the money

rows.label: qst000602_msg0104
rows.name: Give the Chain of Keys

rows.label: qst000602_msg0105
rows.name:
Like I said before,
the job costs 3000G.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0106
rows.name: Much appreciated.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0107
rows.name: It's at Twaina-san's place, right?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0108
rows.name:
I'll go on ahead and start
the repairs. See you later.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0109
rows.name:
Well now, thank you. I
really appreciate it.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0110
rows.name:
It's not something I can
easily afford by saving
up my meager allowance.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0111
rows.name:
Right then, I'm heading over
to Twaina-san's place.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0112
rows.name: I'll get this job done perfectly!

rows.label: qst000602_msg0113
rows.name: You don't have it...

rows.label: qst000602_msg0114
rows.name: What I want is a Chain of Keys.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0116
rows.name:
Either one will do, so come talk
to me again when you have it.

rows.label: qst000602_msg0117
rows.name: Pay 3000G?

rows.label: qst000602_msg0118
rows.name: Pay

rows.label: qst000602_msg0119
rows.name: Don't pay
